testcase.name: Check Login Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed Then the user sees the "LOGIN" screen.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Login With Empty Fields
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed When the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button..................................passed Then the user sees the "Email field cannot be empty" error text in "empty email login" field.passed And the user sees the "Password field cannot be empty" error text in "empty password login" field.passed

testcase.name: Check Login With Invalid Email Format
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed When the user fills the "email login" field with "abc.pt"...................passed And the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button...................................passed Then the user sees the "Wrong email format" error text in "invalid email login" field.passed

testcase.name: Go to Register Screen From Login
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed When the user clicks on the "REGISTER" button...............................passed Then the user sees the "REGISTER" text......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Authentication
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed And the user fills the email field with contacto@email.pt...................passed And the user fills the password field with password.........................passed And the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button...................................passed Then the user sees the "Welcome" text.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Authentication 2
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed And the user fills the email field with rodrigo.campos@mail.pt..............passed And the user fills the password field with 12345678.........................passed And the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button...................................passed Then the user sees the "Welcome" text.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Login With Invalid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed And the user fills the email field with abc@email.pt........................passed And the user fills the password field with 123456789........................passed And the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button...................................passed Then the user sees the "Wrong Credentials" text.............................passed

testcase.name: Check Login With Invalid Credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed And the user fills the email field with utilizador@email.pt.................passed And the user fills the password field with admin............................passed And the user clicks on the "LOGIN" button...................................passed Then the user sees the "Wrong Credentials" text.............................passed
